name: Lipstick Drama
description:
Recently, the online beauty community made a shocking discovery when a new range of lipsticks was launched.

Lipstick Drama is a bitsy retelling of that event. 

Playtime is very short, about 3 minutes. My characters are made up, with their own story.  

The game is made with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.  Thanks to Claire Morley for her workshop at the Oxford and London Interactive Fiction Group.  And to Flo and my sister for their playtest notes.
